description: JavaScript library for  interpolating and generating contours ## Istallation   use npm to install **dline** in node.js  ```  npm i dline ```  or CDN to include **dline** in browser ```  <script src="https://unpkg.com/dline@1.0.3/dist/dline.min.js"></script> ``` ## Documentation ### Converters Helper methods for converting formats #### ascToArray and pointGridToArray Converting string [Esri ASCII](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esri_grid) grid or [GeoJSON](https://geojson.org/) pointgird to **dline** array `{grid,latCellSize,longCellSize,bbox,noData}` ```  dline.ascToArray(asc) ``` ```  dline.pointGridToArray(geoJson,z) ``` `z` -  the property name, default `'value'`
name: dline
